content.rendered:
We’ve had a busy week here at Gottwals Books!

First, we spent a few days with our partners at Burry Bookstore in Hartsville, SC to set up the Walls of Books system.

We are in the middle of setting up Walls of Books, Athens. Go Dawgs!

And we are having a great time this week with Northside Elementary School hosting our first book fair.

excerpt.rendered: We had a busy week here at Gottwals!
